text: Ezɨ kɨ bar me gasɨghasightɨ gumazitam ua me gɨnɨghnɨghan kogham. Kɨ kamaghɨn me damigh, gɨn nɨ damightɨ, nɨ ikɨzir gavgavir bar avɨrimɨn afeziamɨn otoghtɨ, ikɨzir kamɨn dɨbobonim ko gavgavim, bar gumazamizir kurar kabar dɨbobonim ko gavgavim gafiragham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ nan anogoroghan markɨ.’
